name: Trump vs. COVID
description:
Donald Trump is facing a difficult task to try to defeat the Covid-19 pandemic. In order to defeat this virus, Trump needs to get rid of every virus he sees by jumping on them. If you can get rid of the virus, the world will be saved from Covid-19.  

Controls

Left Arrow = Move Left

Right Arrow = Move Right

Up Arrow = Jump

Made By

Kimber Buzzard, Anna Hart, Dan Chalice, Madeline Kugler, and Ethan Fischer 

Troubleshooting

If you are having issues with scrolling you may need to click directly on the game or turn  on scroll lock  (F14 for some Macs)
